// src/components/About.js import React from "react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; const About = () => { return (
{/* Section Title */} About Me Passionate about designing and deploying AI solutions that transform complex data into real-world impact.
{/* Profile Image */}
{/* Content Section */}

Machine Learning Engineer | NLP | LLM Specialist

With over **5 years of experience** in production-ready AI solutions, I specialize in **Natural Language Processing (NLP)**, **Large Language Models (LLMs)**, and **scalable ML systems**. From research to deployment, I ensure your business leverages the power of AI efficiently and responsibly.

{/* Achievements & Focus */}
{/* Key Achievement */}

Key Achievements

Reduced ML processing time by **70%** in production systems.

{/* Current Focus */}

Current Focus

Fine-tuning **Large Language Models (LLMs)** at scale.

{/* Resume Button */} View Full Resume
); }; export default About;
